metadata.title: CVE-2017-15864 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Agent Frontend in Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 3.3.x through3.3.18, with a crafted URL it is possible to gain information like databaseuser and password.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
